title: Table Prop Pack
description: 51 prop meshes related to tables with lots of material instances and customization possibilities.
longDescription:
(All screenshots were taken in default level with added skylight, otherwise default settings).


Table Prop Pack is a pack of 51 prop meshes related to tables with lots of material instances and customization possibilities. Included meshes are: bench (1), bottles (3), bowls (2), candle holders (2), candles (2), bottle cap (1) chairs (2), glasses (4), liquids (11), mugs (4), plates (2), tables (6), tablecloths (6), trays (2) and utensils (3).

Liquid meshes do not have textures and are meant to be used in combination with the bottles/glasses. Tablecloth meshes are meant to be used with the table meshes. Tablecloth meshes do not have UE4 cloth capabilities, they are presimulated static meshes.

Each mesh has custom collision that was generated and customized outside of UE4. Further each mesh has an RGB map with blood (R), dust1 (G) and dust2 (B) that can be used to give the meshes a more rugged look.

Each mesh has at least 3 material instances with high customization possibilities. Included parameter groups for the default master material are Color, DustBlood, Overrides, Vcol1(R), Vcol2(G), Vcol3(B). The liquid meshes have parameters for liquid height and transition length (for the edge).

Each mesh has LOD0 to LOD3 (4 LODs) with customized distance values.

Also included are Blueprints (without implemented functionality) of each mesh and a simple table setting BP.

This pack can be used for games, architectural visualization and VR.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  Custom collision
  •  3+ MIs per mesh
  •  DustBlood RGB maps

Texture Sizes: (please list resolutions for each texture)

  •  4096x4096 (1 mesh)
  •  2048x2048 (all other meshes with textures)
  •  1024x1024 (1 mesh)

Scaled to Epic skeleton: Yes

Collision: Yes, custom generated and customized outside UE4

Vertex Count: 782-16641

LODs: 4

Number of Meshes: 51

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 6 master materials (using material functions) and 244 material instances

Number of Textures: 581 [DustBlood (40), BaseColor (183), Normal (179), OcclusionRoughnessMetallic (179)]

Supported Development Platforms: PC, VR, console

Supported Target Build Platforms: PC, VR, console

Documentation: None

Important/Additional Notes: Tested on PC.
